channel.title: Altersprofil on Keine Mathematik
channel.description: Recent content in Altersprofil on Keine Mathematik

item.title: Kaderprofil - Bayern MÃ¼nchen
item.description: text_size <- 3 background_col <- "seagreen" link_col <- "red" x_breaks <- seq(from = 18, to = 38, by = 2) data <- read_csv(file = file.path("../data/bayern_kader_profil_20200404.csv"), col_types = "cnnnnc") %>% filter(Minutenanteil > 0.05) %>% rowwise() %>% mutate(Spieler = paste0(substr(Spieler, 1, 1), ". ", tail(strsplit(Spieler, " ")[[1]], n=1))) ggplot(data, aes(x = Alter_Jetzt, y = Minutenanteil)) + geom_rect(aes(xmin = 25, xmax = 29, ymin = -Inf, ymax = Inf), fill = background_col, alpha = 0.
